config_parameter.name: org_name
config_parameter.description: Name of your organization.

config_parameter.name: org_url
config_parameter.description: Home page of your organization.

config_parameter.name: admin_email
config_parameter.description: Public email address of the Filelocker Administrator.

config_parameter.name: max_file_life_days
config_parameter.description: Max number of days a file can exist on the system. After this time, the file will be securely erased along with any shares it was associated with.

config_parameter.name: user_inactivity_expiration
config_parameter.description: Max number of days of inactivity permitted on a user account before the account is deleted from the system.

config_parameter.name: delete_command
config_parameter.description: Command used by the operating system that Filelocker is installed on to securely erase a file. This does not include arguments to the command (e.g. 'rm' not 'rm -p')

config_parameter.name: delete_arguments
config_parameter.description: Any parameters needed by the delete command (in an additive fashion, such as -P, -fP, -fPq, etc)

config_parameter.name: antivirus_command
config_parameter.description: Command to execute a virus scan of a file on the operating system on which Filelocker is installed.

config_parameter.name: file_command
config_parameter.description: Command which returns information about a file's type. On most *nix systems, this will be the 'file -b' command

config_parameter.name: max_file_size
config_parameter.description: Maximum size (in Megabytes) for a single file on the system. Individual user quotas will ultimately override this if a user has less space available than this value.(DVD: 4812, CD: 700)

config_parameter.name: default_quota
config_parameter.description: Default quota (in Megabytes) assigned to each user. This can be changed by an administrator

config_parameter.name: smtp_sender
config_parameter.description: This is the email address that Filelocker will send email notifications as.

config_parameter.name: smtp_server
config_parameter.description: The server that Filelocker will use to send mail

config_parameter.name: smtp_start_tls
config_parameter.description: Should Filelocker use StartTLS when connection the SMTP server?

config_parameter.name: smtp_port
config_parameter.description: SMTP Port

config_parameter.name: smtp_auth_required
config_parameter.description: Does this SMTP server require authentication?

config_parameter.name: smtp_user
config_parameter.description: If SMTP server requires authentication, what username should be used to connect (leave blank if no auth required)?

config_parameter.name: smtp_pass
config_parameter.description: If SMTP server requires authentication, what password should be used (leave blank if no auth required)?

config_parameter.name: smtp_obscure_links
config_parameter.description: Would you like for links in emails to obscured by adding spaces between periods and stripping off http:// and https://?

config_parameter.name: auth_type
config_parameter.description: Authentication mechanism Filelocker should use (e.g. LDAP, CAS, Local)

config_parameter.name: directory_type
config_parameter.description: Type of directory to use (e.g. local, ldap)

config_parameter.name: cas_url
config_parameter.description: URL of CAS server

config_parameter.name: ldap_host
config_parameter.description: URI of LDAP directory

config_parameter.name: ldap_bind_dn
config_parameter.description: LDAP Bind DN (e.g. ou=ped,dc=purdue,dc=edu)

config_parameter.name: ldap_bind_user
config_parameter.description: Account to use when binding to LDAP for searching (anonymous if blank)?

config_parameter.name: ldap_bind_pass
config_parameter.description: Password to use when binding to LDAP for searching (anonymous if blank)?

config_parameter.name: ldap_is_active_directory
config_parameter.description: Is this LDAP server and Active Directory server?

config_parameter.name: ldap_domain_name
config_parameter.description: Active Directory will not authenticate a bind unless you use the FQDN

config_parameter.name: ldap_user_name_attr
config_parameter.description: LDAP username attribute

config_parameter.name: ldap_last_name_attr
config_parameter.description: LDAP last name attribute

config_parameter.name: ldap_first_name_attr
config_parameter.description: LDAP first name attribute

config_parameter.name: ldap_displayname_attr
config_parameter.description: LDAP display name attribute, if one is to be used

config_parameter.name: ldap_email_attr
config_parameter.description: LDAP email address attribute

config_parameter.name: banner
config_parameter.description: Message displayed to all users upon login

config_parameter.name: geotagging
config_parameter.description: Should users be allowed to geotag Filelocker uploads?

config_parameter.name: db_version
config_parameter.description: Running version of the Filelocker Database
